title: Re-augment a Quarkus Application
summary: This document explains how to re-augment a Quarkus application to adapt to different build time configurations using a mutable jar. It details when re-augmentation is useful, such as switching database drivers or toggling features, and outlines the necessary steps for rebuilding the application with a new configuration. It also warns against including sensitive information in build configuration files and points out that native images can't be used with mutable jars.
